  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class TextFieldController
extends JFCController
implements java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener

      • update

        protected void update()
        Description copied from class: JFCController
        Called to have component update itself. By default, should call updateEnabled, updateVisible Most subclasses will then call update(comp, value) to update component icon/colors/font,etc
        Overrides:
        update in class JFCController
